item.title: Selket Nicole add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "I would challenge you to a battle of wits, but I see you are unarmed!" -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Selket Nicole add a quote by Helene Hanff
item.description: "I do love secondhand books that open to the page some previous owner read oftenest. The day Hazlitt came he opened to "I hate to read new books," and I hollered "Comrade!" to whoever owned it before me." -- Helene Hanff

item.title: Selket Nicole add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "Love all, trust a few, do wrong to none." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Selket Nicole add a quote by John Green
item.description: "What a slut time is. She screws everybody." -- John Green

item.title: Selket Nicole add a quote by John Green
item.description: "You are so busy being YOU that you have no idea how utterly unprecedented you are." -- John Green

item.title: Selket Nicole add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "The first thing we do, let's kill all the lawyers." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Selket Nicole add a quote by William Shakespeare
Selket Nicole add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "Get busy living or get busy dying." -- Stephen King

item.title: Selket Nicole add a quote by John Green
item.description: "My thoughts are stars I cannot fathom into constellations." -- John Green

item.title: Selket Nicole add a quote by John Green
item.description: "You don't get to choose if you get hurt in this world...but you do have some say in who hurts you. I like my choices." -- John Green

item.title: Selket Nicole add a quote by John Green
item.description: "Some tourists think Amsterdam is a city of sin, but in truth it is a city of freedom. And in freedom, most people find sin." -- John Green

item.title: Selket Nicole add a quote by Maureen Johnson
item.description: "There is nothing about a bad situation that fourteen hyper cheerleaders can't worsen." -- Maureen Johnson

item.title: Selket Nicole add a quote by John Green
item.description: "You don't remember what happened. What you remember becomes what happened." -- John Green

item.title: Selket Nicole add a quote by Robin Sloan
item.description: "Neel takes a sharp breath and I know exactly what it means. It means: I have waited my whole life to walk through a secret passage built into a bookshelf." -- Robin Sloan

item.title: Selket Nicole add a quote by F. Scott Fitzgerald
item.description: "They slipped briskly into an intimacy from which they never recovered." -- F. Scott Fitzgerald

item.title: Selket Nicole add a quote by Helene Hanff
item.description: "Did I tell you I finally found the perfect page-cutter? It's a pearl-handled fruit knife. My mother left me a dozen of them, I keep one in the pencil cup on my desk. Maybe I go with the wrong kind of people but i'm just not likely to have twelve guests all sitting around simultaneously eating fruit." -- Helene Hanff

item.title: Selket Nicole add a quote by Roger Ebert
item.description: "Kindness’ covers all of my political beliefs. No need to spell them out. I believe that if, at the end, according to our abilities, we have done something to make others a little happier, and something to make ourselves a little happier, that is about the best we can do. To make others less happy is a crime. To make ourselves unhappy is where all crime starts. We must try to contribute joy to the world. That is true no matter what our problems, our health, our circumstances. We must try. I didn’t always know this and am happy I lived long enough to find it out." -- Roger Ebert

item.title: Selket Nicole add a quote by Abraham Lincoln
item.description: "My Best Friend is a person who will give me a book I have not read." -- Abraham Lincoln

item.title: Selket Nicole add a quote by Mindy Kaling
item.description: "There is no sunrise so beautiful that it is worth waking me up to see it." -- Mindy Kaling

item.title: Selket Nicole add a quote by John Green
item.description: "As he read, I fell in love the way you fall asleep: slowly, and then all at once." -- John Green

item.title: Selket Nicole add a quote by Luisa Weiss
item.description: "Distance means nothing when your kitchen smells like home." -- Luisa Weiss
